title: L.A. Reported prepares for launch as a weekly Substack that “won’t waste readers’ time”
description: How many times have you read a Substack — even a good one! — and thought, “This could use an editor”? A new nonprofit newsroom wants to combine magazine-style editing, deep connections to local reporting talent, and the easy-to-launch newsletter model to cover Los Angeles County. L.A. Reported believes “a smaller number of higher-quality, deeply...
